cells.data:
## Purpose

Propogation of Augusto's (Emilia's construct). See [construct informationÂ ](quiver-note-url/8B89C876-04AE-45DE-833E-72B948EA3F00).

## DNA and Samples

Lanes 1-9 were directly dipped from plasmid (mix and go compentent cells) colonies.

Primers: Are from the tubulin region and given to me by Augusto they were called "28" and "29". Expected length is 420bp.

## Program

| step | temp       |  time  |
|------|------------|--------|
| 1    | 95         | 30 sec |
| 2    | 95         | 15 sec |
| 3    | 58         | 1 min  |
| 4    | 72         | 2 min  |
| 5    | 72         | 1 min  |
| 6    | 4          | hold   |

## Results

Every single colony worked.  All colonies contained construnct.  Next, I need to [recover the plasmid from the culture](https://www.addgene.org/plasmid-protocols/purify-plasmid-dna/).

![Screen Shot 2016-08-23 at 10.35.29AM.png](quiver-image-url/277E019059A0B1C4AABCA2FEC99522C2.png)
